attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purchase of the toy known as the Playstation 3 is breaking up family structures. It is causing whey-faced 20-somethings to spurn society, and spend yet-to-be-earned cash on High Definition screens to use with this evil gadget. It causes nothing but social asphixyation, debt, and crippling arthritis

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
